titles.title: To restrict the use of foreign adversary LiDAR in the United States.
To restrict the use of foreign adversary LiDAR in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Energy and Commerce, and in addition to the Committees on Oversight and Government Reform, and Transportation and Infrastructure, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
